title: FS: T332 Helmar Stamp Mordecai Brown PSA 4
author: TT40391

posts.post_title: FS: T332 Helmar Stamp Mordecai Brown PSA 4
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone I have a PSA 4 Helmar Stamp of Mordecai Brown I am selling. I am not sure what price to set on it because I do not deal with a lot of these. It looks great and it is very rare.  Please send offers to [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  I am always happy to negotiate on price.  Scan is attached below.  If I do not get any offers is a few days I will put it up on ebay.  

Tony Turner

I moved this to ebay on a three day auction.  Here is the link:

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/T332-Helmar-Stamps-Mordecai-Brown-PSA-4-/250882519017?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item3a69c36fe9[/url]

Thanks 

Tony Turner
